project_list.name: Portfolio Website
project_list.design: This website was created using React and bootstrap.
project_list.deployment: This website is deployed using S3 with the Static Webiste hosting configuration. Https is provided by Cloudfront and AWS ACM, DNS is provided by Route53

project_list.name: Scheduler
project_list.design: This website was created using Angular, Typescript and AWS SAM
project_list.deployment: The Frontend of this website was created using S3 static website hosting and the backend was built using the AWS Serverless Application model.
